Leader: Welcome, Leader. Your strategic mind is crucial. The team looks to you to gather vital Metal resources. Coordinate your team, navigate the dangers, and ensure the hull is fortified before time runs out!
Warrior: Warrior, your strength is needed! Focus your efforts on collecting sturdy Wood. The ship relies on the resilience you bring. Venture forth, gather Wood, and protect the team's progress.
Mage: Greetings, Mage. Your connection to the arcane is key. Seek out the shimmering Stardust scattered across the grid. Your insights and the power of Stardust will illuminate the path forward.
Jester: Hail, Jester! Your unpredictable path may lead to valuable Feathers. Keep spirits high and gather these light resources. Your unique perspective might uncover hidden opportunities. Go find those Feathers!
